name: Creative Functional Tonal Infinity Loop Scarf Wrap Shawl Textile Necklace Unisex Deep Red Wine
description:
Textural layers of threads, hand and machine sewing and embroidery in tones of deep red wine. All handcrafted together to create a unique fabric and textile garment. This creation can be worn as a scarf, textile necklace or wrapped around creatively as a shawl.

DETAILS

- Handcrafted Fabric
- Subtle, Tonal and Earthy Embroidery and Stitching
- Natural Manmade Blend
- 20cm Width x 210cm Circumference
- Weight 220grams
- Unisex Design
- Wear creatively as a Loop Scarf, Necklace, Wrap Top or Headband
- Available in 1 Colour: Deep Red Wine
- Each Creation is Designed and Handcrafted with Love and Patience
- Price $179

This creation is inspired by the tones of colour, layers and texture of a deep red rose. I worked on this piece over a process of 6 weeks. I work on each wearable art piece slowly over time. This way I can enjoy all of the moments making and the creative process and journey of each creation.

- Complimentary Postage

*Please note colours may vary slightly depending on individual monitor settings*

Yael Myerson Textiles is a unique collection of stylish, tactile and creatively functional knitwear, textiles and fashion accessories. Each creation is individually designed and patiently handcrafted in Melbourne, Australia.

Would you like to see more of my creations? There are more listed in my shop;
http://yaelmyerson.bigcartel.com/

name: Wearable Art Creative Tonal Hand Knitted Gathered Cape Skirt Denim Bow Women Charcoal Grey
description:
Blended tonal and textural threads, hand knitted fabric in chracoal grey. Creatively designed and handcrafted into a gathered skirt or cape with large handmade denim bow. This creation can be worn as cape, poncho, chunky scarf or skirt.

DETAILS

- Handcrafted, Hand Knitted Fabric
- Textural and Tonal Colour Mix
- Natural Manmade Blend
- 40cm Width x 130cm Length (when gathered) 460cm Length (not gathered) Denim Bow 8cm Width
- Weight 2kilograms
- Suitable for Women
- One Size Fits Most
- Wear creatively as a Cape, Poncho or Skirt
- Available in 1 Colour: Charcoal Grey
- Each Creation is Designed and Handcrafted with Love and Patience
- Price $499

This creation is inspired by the colour and textures of the rustic world and the shape of a flower. I also wanted to achieve an overscaled ruffled flower shape that could change depending on the drawstring and bow. I worked on this piece over a process of 12 months. I work on each wearable art piece slowly over time. This way I can enjoy all of the moments making and the creative process and journey of each creation.

- Complimentary Postage

*Please note colours may vary slightly depending on individual monitor settings*

Yael Myerson Textiles is a unique collection of stylish, tactile and creatively functional knitwear, textiles and fashion accessories. Each creation is individually designed and patiently handcrafted in Melbourne, Australia.

name: Creative Functional Tonal Knitted Scarf Wrap with Mohair Tonal Swirl Embroidery Unisex Rust Brown
description:
Knitted fabric with organic swirl pattern decorative and textural mohair embroidery in rust brown. This creation can be worn as a knotted scarf, loop scarf, wrap scarf, textile necklace or shawl.

DETAILS

- Handcrafted Knitted Fabric using a Hand Operated Knitting Machine
- Tonal Textural Embroidery and Stitching
- Textural and Tonal Colour Mix
- Wool Cotton Mohair Acrylic Blend
- 50cm Width x 280cm Length
- Weight 710grams
- Unisex Design
- Wear creatively as a Scarf, Wrap or Shawl
- Available in 1 Colour: Rust Brown
- Each Creation is Designed and Handcrafted with Love and Patience
- Price $219

This creation is inspired by the textures and and earthiness of foliage growth and organic patterns. I worked on this piece over a process of 10 weeks. I work on each wearable art piece slowly over time. This way I can enjoy all of the moments making and the creative process and journey of each creation.

- Complimentary Postage

*Please note colours may vary slightly depending on individual monitor settings*

Yael Myerson Textiles is a unique collection of stylish, tactile and creatively functional knitwear, textiles and fashion accessories. Each creation is individually designed and patiently handcrafted in Melbourne, Australia.

name: Creative Functional Tonal Knitted Poncho Scarf with Textural Embroidery Women Mustard Gold
description:
Knitted fabric with textural organic pattern with embroidery and stitching in mustard gold. This creation can be worn as an asymmetrical poncho, shawl, stole, cowl, scarf or wrap.

DETAILS

- Handcrafted Knitted Fabric using a Hand Operated Knitting Machine
- Textural, Tonal and Contrasting Colours
- Wool Cotton Acrylic Blend
- 55cm Width x 70cm Length (140cm from End to End)
- Weight 385grams
- Suitable for Women
- Small Medium Size (Fits Most)
- Medium Large and Large Extra Large Sizes Available on Request
- Creative and Functional Design
- Many Options Available on Ways to Wear Garment
- Wear creatively as a Poncho, Scarf, Top or Shawl
- Available in 1 Colour: Mustard Gold
- Each Creation is Designed and Handcrafted with Love and Patience
- Price $109

This creation is inspired by the organic patterns and shapes, colours and textures of nature. This design is very functional and can be worn creatively in many ways. I work on each wearable art piece slowly over time. This way I can enjoy all of the moments making and the creative process and journey of each creation.

- Complimentary Postage

*Please note colours may vary slightly depending on individual monitor settings*

Yael Myerson Textiles is a unique collection of stylish, tactile and creatively functional knitwear, textiles and fashion accessories. Each creation is individually designed and patiently handcrafted in Melbourne, Australia.

name: Wearable Art Creative Tonal Textural Embroidery Poncho Scarf Wrap Shawl Elegant Women Golden Cream
description:
Textural layers of threads, hand and machine sewing and embroidery in tones of golden cream. All handcrafted onto a lightweight layer of sheer gold organza. This creation can be worn as an elegant and sheer poncho, kaftan, dress or creatively as a scarf.

DETAILS

- Handcrafted Fabric
- Subtle, Tonal and Earthy Embroidery and Stitching
- Natural Manmade Blend
- Sheer Organza Backing Layer
- Unstructured Style
- One Size Fits Most
- 85cm Width x 60cm Lenghth (120cm from End to End) Neckhole 8cm Width x 28cm Length
- Weight 255grams
- Suitable for Women
- Wear creatively as a Poncho, Scarf, Kaftan or Dress
- Available in 1 Colour: Golden Cream on Sheer Gold
- Each Creation is Designed and Handcrafted with Love and Patience
- Price $329

This creation is inspired by patterns and channels of the view of the earth from the sky. This poncho took about 10 weeks to make. I work on each wearable art piece slowly over time. This way I can enjoy all of the moments making and the creative process and journey of each creation.

- Complimentary Postage

*Please note colours may vary slightly depending on individual monitor settings*

Yael Myerson Textiles is a unique collection of stylish, tactile and creatively functional knitwear, textiles and fashion accessories. Each creation is individually designed and patiently handcrafted in Melbourne, Australia.
